person.persName: John B. Peyton (A Kentucky doctor; served on the Military Board of Kentucky)

body.p: A Virginia-born, Kentucky doctor. Lived in Logan County, Kentucky in 1860. Worked as a Bank Teller. Served on the Military Board of Kentucky in 1861.

bibl.p: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1 (Frankfort: John H. Harney, Public Printer, 1866), VII; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, Russellville District No 2, p. 118.
